    void makePenalty()
    generates a random number between 750 and 250 this is used as the gold taken if the player loses the dice game
    void passTurn()
    this is the only time the players total score increases as you must lock in your turn score by ending your turn
    void pirateTurn()
    calls to the DiceGame.PirateTurn to create a new pirate score based on the one input into the function then passes back to the players turn unless the pirate has reached the score threshold

    Calls to the DiceGame.then alters the players turn and total values based on the string returned.

      public void pirateTurn()
